page.title: 17EVENTS, SPETCHLEY AREA
page.content: {TRADITIONAL EVENTS}take place on occasions of national celebration, for example, in 1977, Queen Elizabeth's{Silver Jubilee was feted in style with a sports day in the deer park, a pig-roast and a less traditional disco-dance.Aservice followed the next day in the parish church of Spetchley at which all faiths attended. The{wedding of Prince Charles to {Lady Diana Spencer}was the occasion of a large tea-party at the Hall in 1981. Annual events in the area centre on the activities of the Gardening clubThere is a{Spring bulb festival and an{Autumn flower and vegetable {show.}The club meets monthly and has a Xmas social. { Electricity and gas}only arrived in the villages 30 years ago and their provision is a 'recent event' to some!
